ctypes.comment: JSON array of allowed file extensions or NULL for no restriction.
ctypes.name: ctypes

cversioning.comment: Number of versions of files to keep. 0 means disabled, NULL means keep all versions.
cversioning.name: cversioning

clog.comment: Number of days to keep download logs. 0 means disables, NULL means never delete logs.
clog.name: clog

clast_file_id.comment: Latest file ID in this category or any sub-category
clast_file_id.name: clast_file_id

clast_file_date.comment: Latest file date in this category or any sub-category
clast_file_date.name: clast_file_date

cclub_id.comment: The club ID if this category belongs to a club, or NULL
cclub_id.name: cclub_id

cversion_numbers.comment: 0 = Disable version numbers, 1 = Allow version numbers, 2 = Require version numbers
cversion_numbers.name: cversion_numbers

cmultiple_files.comment: Allow multiple files to be uploaded
cmultiple_files.name: cmultiple_files

file_primary_screenshot.comment: The record_id of the primary screenshot
file_primary_screenshot.name: file_primary_screenshot

file_locked.comment: If the file is locked (no comments/reviews allowed)
file_locked.name: file_locked

file_last_comment.comment: Timestamp the last comment was made
file_last_comment.name: file_last_comment

record_time.comment: Unix timestamp of when file was uploaded
record_time.name: record_time

record_no_watermark.comment: If the record is for a screenshot, the URL to the un-watermarked version
record_no_watermark.name: record_no_watermark

review_mid.comment: The member ID of the review author
review_mid.name: review_mid

review_append_edit.comment: Boolean indicating if edit message should show
review_append_edit.name: review_append_edit

review_edit_time.comment: Unix timestamp of when the review was last edited
review_edit_time.name: review_edit_time

review_edit_name.comment: Username of user who last edited review
review_edit_name.name: review_edit_name

review_date.comment: Unix timestamp of when review was made
review_date.name: review_date

review_ip.comment: IP address review was made from
review_ip.name: review_ip

review_author_name.comment: Username of user who made review
review_author_name.name: review_author_name

review_rating.comment: The rating (out of 5) with the review
review_rating.name: review_rating

review_votes.comment: The number of people who have voted "helpful" or "unhelpful"
review_votes.name: review_votes

review_votes_helpful.comment: The number of people who have voted "helpful"
review_votes_helpful.name: review_votes_helpful

review_votes_data.name: review_votes_data
review_votes_data.comment: JSON object containing data about who has voted helpful/unhelpful
